info.name: Dark Flat KAT
info.description: Flat dark theme for Kickass Torrents (aka KAT) with ads removal. This style also provides some quick fixes of the theme it is based on. BRAND NEW CUSTOM FLAT LOGO! Please rate this theme & give feedback ;) Theme by n0x (nox).
info.additionalInfo: -- Get more userstyles from me! -- - Also take a look at my WIKIPEDIA dark style! - ---------------------------------------------- 07/06/2016 FIX: Fix community page and forum dark theme USER REPORTED 03/25/2016 UPDATE: Added Spyker07 quickfixes for 1080p monitors. Many thanks to him! USER REPORTED 01/04/2016 FIX: Fix email button appearance. USER REPORTED 01/03/2016 UPDATE: Added fixed position comments preview. USER REPORTED 12/19/2015 FIX: Fix torrent page tabs navigation display. USER REPORTED 12/01/2015 FIX: Fix download/share buttons after source style update. 10/18/2015 UPDATE: Removed ads from source site latest update. 10/06/2015 FIX: Fix button border radius bug from source site. 09/18/2015 FIX: Main buttons update from source website. 09/14/2015 FIX: Grayscale filters problems on other browsers than Firefox. 09/07/2015 UPDATE: Deleted ads link in torrents search, introduced flatten search bar and a brand new custom logo! 09/07/2015 FIX: Torrent files mouse-hover color has been fixed, no matter how many imbricated subfolders there are. 09/06/2015 UPDATE: Major edit to flatten and unify absolutely everything. Fixed covered up torrent informations. 09/05/2015 UPDATE: Icons, buttons and graphics updated to match general darken style. Fixed original style icons display bug. 07/07/2015 UPDATE: Logo color less flashy, with smooth color change when hovering. 07/06/2015 FIX: TV Series episodes viewer (with release dates and seasons). Drop down lists and fold/unfold episodes have been updated. ---------------------------------------------- This theme hides the right (useless) sidebar, as well as the contained advertisements. Disclaimer: We just provide a user style for this page. Any other elements (such as name, trademarks or images) shown in the screenshot are all under the responsibility of the previous hosting site. The content is therefore not our property. ---------------------------------------------- Keywords: kickass torrents, kat, kickasstorrents, kickass.to, kat.cr, KickassTorrents, KickAssTorrents, KAT, FT Deepdark
